item.title: BnaA2.NIP5;1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA02G0242800 Gene Symbol: BnaA2.NIP5 1 Gene Name: Genome: Darmor-bzh reference genome Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Specific and multiple-target gene silencing reveals function diversity of BnaA2.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaA03C0265800 Gene Symbol: BnaA3.NIP5;1 Gene Name: Genome: Darmor-bzh reference genome Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Specific and multiple-target gene silencing reveals function diversity of BnaA2.

item.title: BnaA4.BOR2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaAnn31830D Gene Symbol: BnaA4.BOR2 Gene Name: B efflux transporter Genome: Brassica napus Genome Resources Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnaA4.

item.title: BnaC4.BOR2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaC04g21390D Gene Symbol: BnaC4.BOR2 Gene Name: low-B (LB)-inducible Genome: rapeseed genome Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnaC4.

item.title: BnaPPT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaA08g07320D Gene Symbol: BnaPPT1 Gene Name: Genome: B.

item.title: BnPHT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnPHT1|4 Gene Name: PHT1 phosphate transporter Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: The high-affinity transporter BnPHT1|4|BnPHT1|4 is involved in phosphorus acquisition and mobilization for facilitating seed germination and early seedling growth of Brassica napus.

item.title: BoPMEI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BoPMEI1 Gene Name: pectin methylesterase inhibitor Genome: Species: Brassica oleracea Functional Descriptions: BoPMEI1, a pollen-specific pectin methylesterase inhibitor, has an essential role in pollen tube growth.

item.title: CaAIPP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaAIPP1 Gene Name: protein phosphatase 2C 37 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Functional analysis of the pepper protein phosphatase, CaAIPP1, and its interacting partner CaAIRF1: Modulation of ABA signalling and the drought stress response.

item.title: CaPIMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaPIMT1 Gene Name: L-isoaspartyl methyltransferase 1 Genome: Species: Cicer arietinum Functional Descriptions: PROTEIN L-ISOASPARTYL METHYLTRANSFERASE1 (CaPIMT1) from chickpea mitigates oxidative stress-induced growth inhibition of Escherichia coli.

item.title: ClEXPA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ClEXPA1 Gene Name: α-expansin1 Genome: Species: Cunninghamia lanceolata Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of two cambium-abundant Chinese fir (Cunninghamia lanceolata) α-expansin genes ClEXPA1 and ClEXPA2 affect growth and development in transgenic tobacco and increase the amount of cellulose in stem cell walls.

item.title: ClEXPA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ClEXPA2 Gene Name: α-expansin2 Genome: Species: Cunninghamia lanceolata Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of two cambium-abundant Chinese fir (Cunninghamia lanceolata) α-expansin genes ClEXPA1 and ClEXPA2 affect growth and development in transgenic tobacco and increase the amount of cellulose in stem cell walls.

item.title: CsCWIN3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa3G777580 Gene Symbol: CsCWIN3 Gene Name: Cell wall invertase 3 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Cell wall invertase 3 (CsCWIN3) plays critical roles in providing sugars during pollination and fertilization in cucumber CsCWIN3-RNA interference plants also showed affected seed development.

item.title: CsMYB4a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA003515.1 Gene Symbol: CsMYB4a Gene Name: R2R3-MYB Sg4 member from Camellia sinensis Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsMYB4a works synergistically with CsIAA4 and participates in regulation of the auxin pathway in stamen.

item.title: CsSWEET17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsSWEET17 Gene Name: Sugars Will Eventually be Exported Transporter 17 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsSWEET1a and CsSWEET17 Mediate Growth and Freezing Tolerance by Promoting Sugar Transport across the Plasma Membrane.

item.title: CsSWEET1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsSWEET1a Gene Name: Sugars Will Eventually be Exported Transporter 1 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsSWEET1a and CsSWEET17 Mediate Growth and Freezing Tolerance by Promoting Sugar Transport across the Plasma Membrane.

item.title: D5;ZmTPS7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb071070 Gene Symbol: D5 ZmTPS7 ZmTPS44 Gene Name: dwarf plant 5|terpene synthase 7 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: GhEXPA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhEXPA1 Gene Name: alpha-expansin 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Here, we show that GhRDL1 is localized in cell wall and interacts with GhEXPA1, an α-expansin functioning in wall loosening.

item.title: GhRDL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhRDL1 Gene Name: dehydration-induced protein RD22-like protein1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Here, we show that GhRDL1 is localized in cell wall and interacts with GhEXPA1, an α-expansin functioning in wall loosening.

item.title: GhWRKY17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhWRKY17 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 17 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The Cotton WRKY Transcription Factor GhWRKY17 Functions in Drought and Salt Stress in Transgenic Nicotiana benthamiana Through ABA Signaling and the Modulation of Reactive Oxygen Species Production.

item.title: GL3.2
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os03g30420 RAPdb gene ID: Os03g0417700 Gene Symbol: GL3.

item.title: GmAAP6a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.17g192000 Gene Symbol: GmAAP6a Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of GmAAP6a enhances tolerance to low nitrogen and improves seed nitrogen status by optimizing amino acid partitioning in soybean.

item.title: GmAOX2b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmAOX2b Gene Name: alternative oxidase 3 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: A GmAOX2b antisense gene compromises vegetative growth and seed production in soybean.

item.title: GmFATA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gyma.18G167300 Gene Symbol: GmFATA1 Gene Name: acyl–acyl carrier protein thioesterase 1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The acyl–acyl carrier protein thioesterases GmFATA1 and GmFATA2 are essential for fatty acid accumulation and growth in soybean.

item.title: GmFATA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08G349200 Gene Symbol: GmFATA2 Gene Name: acyl–acyl carrier protein thioesterase 2 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The acyl–acyl carrier protein thioesterases GmFATA1 and **GmFATA2 **are essential for fatty acid accumulation and growth in soybean.

item.title: GmGPDHp1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02G218700 Gene Symbol: GmGPDHp1 Gene Name: Glycerol-3-phosphate Dehydrogenase 1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: These results reveal a key role for GmGPDHp1-mediated G3P metabolism in enhancing TAG synthesis and demonstrate a strategy to modify the FA compositions of soybean oils for improved nutrition and biofuel.

item.title: GmHSP17.9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.17G045800 Gene Symbol: GmHSP17.9 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: A small heat shock protein, GmHSP17.

item.title: GmNOD100;GmSS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.13G114000 Gene Symbol: GmNOD100 GmSS1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmNOD100, a sucrose synthase in soybean nodules which was also preferentially expressed in the infected zone of nodules, similar to GmHSP17.

item.title: GmPIP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08g015300 Gene Symbol: GmPIP1|6 Gene Name: plasma membrane intrinsic protein 1|6 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The effects of constitutive overexpression of GmPIP1|6|GmPIP1|6 in soybean was examined under normal and salt stress conditions.

item.title: GmSIZ1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.12g071300 Gene Symbol: GmSIZ1a Gene Name: SUMO E3 ligase 1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: SUMO E3 Ligases GmSIZ1a and GmSIZ1b regulate vegetative growth in soybean.

item.title: GmSIZ1b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.U020100 Gene Symbol: GmSIZ1b Gene Name: SUMO E3 ligase 1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: SUMO E3 Ligases GmSIZ1a and GmSIZ1b regulate vegetative growth in soybean.

item.title: GmSPX5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma10g40820 Gene Symbol: GmSPX5 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Phosphate starvation responsive GmSPX5 mediates nodule growth through interaction with GmNF-YC4 in soybean.

item.title: Gshdz4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Gshdz4 Gene Name: transcription factor hdz4 Genome: Species: Glycine soja Functional Descriptions: A novel Glycine soja homeodomain-leucine zipper (HD-Zip) I gene, Gshdz4, positively regulates bicarbonate tolerance and responds to osmotic stress in Arabidopsis.

item.title: HaDREB2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HaDREB2 Gene Name: DREB2 transcription factor Genome: Species: Helianthus annuus Functional Descriptions: The HaDREB2 transcription factor enhances basal thermotolerance and longevity of seeds through functional interaction with HaHSFA9.

item.title: HvRAF
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvRAF Gene Name: root abundant factor Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: The barley ERF-type transcription factor HvRAF confers enhanced pathogen resistance and salt tolerance in Arabidopsis.

item.title: Ms44;ZmLTPc1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb198610 Gene Symbol: Ms44 ZmLTPc1 MFS14 Gene Name: male sterile44 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: MtKIX8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtKIX8 Gene Name: KINASE-INDUCIBLE DOMAIN INTERACTING 8 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: KINASE-INDUCIBLE DOMAIN INTERACTING 8 (MtKIX8) regulates helical pod morphology in Medicago truncatula.

item.title: NtKRP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtKRP Gene Name: kinesin-related protein Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: Ribosomal protein NtRPL17 interacts with kinesin-12 family protein NtKRP and functions in the regulation of embryo/seed size and radicle growth.

item.title: NtRPL17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtRPL17 Gene Name: 60S ribosomal protein L17 Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: Ribosomal protein NtRPL17 interacts with kinesin-12 family protein NtKRP and functions in the regulation of embryo/seed size and radicle growth.

item.title: Sl-STIG1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Sl-STIG1 Gene Name: STIGMA-SPECIFIC PROTEIN1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Tomato Pistil Factor STIG1 Promotes in Vivo Pollen Tube Growth by Binding to Phosphatidylinositol 3-Phosphate and the Extracellular Domain of the Pollen Receptor Kinase LePRK2.

item.title: SlGA2ox1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlGA2ox1 Gene Name: gibberellin 2-oxidase Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Identification and characterization of tomato gibberellin 2-oxidases (GA2oxs) and effects of fruit-specific SlGA2ox1 overexpression on fruit and seed growth and development.

item.title: SlPYL9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc09g015380 Gene Symbol: SlPYL9 Gene Name: Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: SlUGT75C1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc09g092500 Gene Symbol: SlUGT75C1 Gene Name: UDP-glycosyltransferase 75C1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlUGT75C1 catalyzes the glucosylation of both ABA and IAA in vitro| SlUGT76E1 can only catalyze the conjugation of ABA| and SlUGT73C4 cannot glycosylate either ABA or IAA.

item.title: TaNAC2-5A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaNAC2-5A Gene Name: Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: The Nitrate-Inducible NAC Transcription Factor TaNAC2-5A Controls Nitrate Response and Increases Wheat Yield.

item.title: TaPI4KIIγ
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaPI4KIIγ Gene Name: type II PI4K Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: A stress-inducible type II PI4K gene, named TaPI4KIIγ, was obtained by de novo transcriptome sequencing of drought-treated wheat (Triticum aestivum).

item.title: TraesCS5A02G542600
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS5A02G542600 Gene Symbol: TraesCS5A02G542600 Gene Name: transmembrane transporter Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: We identified putative candidate genes that are potentially involved in metal uptake, transport, and assimilation, including TraesCS5A02G542600 on chromosome 5A, which was annotated as a Major Facilitator Superfamily transporter and acted on all the minerals except K.

item.title: VviINO
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: VIT_201s0127g00330 Gene Symbol: VviINO Gene Name: Vitis vinifera INNER NO OUTER Genome: Vitis vinifera genome 12X V2 Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: We conclusively demonstrated that the grapevine orthologue VviINO retains similar protein targets and activity in the grape as in Arabidopsis, since it could fully restore the outer integument growth in Arabidopsis ino-1 mutant.
